name: YURI AI
introduce: YURI AI is an API-integrated gaming eco-protocol that is based on ChatGPT. It allows users to, via the API, log into all ecosystems embedded in the platform with a single click. In addition to the blockchain network and the artificial intelligence technology, it also utilizes the Arbitrum network to establish a YURI AI digital chain gaming ecosystem. YURI AI aims to enable users to entertain themselves more efficiently through AI and Game while gaining profits in doing so.
